subject: Running
lead_paragraph: Jesper Olsen is running from one end of the world to the other, soaking up the atmosphere mile after mile. He began in July 2008 in Nordkapp, Norway, and aims to finish in Newfoundland in July.
snippet: Jesper Olsen is running from one end of the world to the other, soaking up the atmosphere mile after mile. He began in July 2008 in Nordkapp, Norway, and aims to finish in Newfoundland in July.
